alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wyandotte, northeastern Johnson and west central Jackson Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 731 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairway, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Independence, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Raytown, Prairie Village, Merriam, Mission, Fairway, Mission Hills, Riverside, Westwood, Lake Quivira, Kansas City Kansas, Kansas City, Westwood Hills, Mission Woods, Countryside and Roeland Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 11. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 416 and 423. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 226 and 235. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 435 between mile markers 6 and 7, and between mile markers 61 and 66, and near mile marker 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
